name: Missile Command Atari 2600 'Remake'
description:
Remake of the classic Atari 2600 banger Missile Command, now on Mac. Defend six cities from nuclear hellfire. Enjoy classic controls adapted to the Mac.

Since this game is unsigned, Mac will notify you on boot that it is untrusted. To get by this open the game, then open up your Security & Privacy app -> General -> Open Anyway 

DISCLAIMER: AGEN Productions does not, nor claims to, hold the copyright for missile command. It is currently held by Atari. This was a small project used to explore C++ with the SDL framework
